text:
Hello awesome people,

I have one question regarding my upcoming project. My client wants to redesign their HubSpot website. Now I have new web site's html code ready. Now, to integrate in HubSpot, can I create theme and integrate new  website design in developer account and migrate it to customer's live account?
I recommend reading up on the documentation:<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started>
I do recommend setting up on a developer portal - You canâ€™t migrate content easily, but if you use the CLI you can quite easily upload the templates.
